blog.name: jonahdisasterbeck
blog.title: it's pride month baby
blog.description:
Jacob 🌵 21 
he/him | trans | ,,,,straight
icon by bexmackquinn

summary: why dont you pay attention to josh?
question: why dont you pay attention to josh?
answer:
I don’t think there should be fandoms or stan culture for human beings at all I used to be in one and it wasn’t healthy for me or for the humans behind them

I think more people should appreciate the work rather than the people behind it

So besides hoping all the kids involved are healthy, safe, and comfortable I don’t pay attention

summary: yknow i realized this girl i know is literally the ghc mixed,, she's half black, half chinese, she's jewish and gay lmao that's...

answer: Damn that is something Spicy. Does she know how amazing she is since she is so well composed of our Disney babies 😉

blog.name: thinkinaboutambris
blog.title: can i stay?™
blog.description: a tyrus/ambiris/bandi/jibby stan blog basically, hope you enjoy your stay! Oh dear its a sideblog. Nickname is TJ occasionally ghostie. they/them. 16. lesbian here. Ugh have you seen tjskipping? Unfair that she is so amazing <3 Ask box is always open! Prompts or just talking :). Credit to creators of header (jonahbex) and icon (wlwambris)!

tags: lilac is first emotion of love
summary: ambi soulmate au
title: ambi soulmate au
body:
Theres a story of how humans were originally connected to the one who they would spend life with, platonic or romantic. But the gods decided the human connection like that was too powerful and separated each pair. Some were lucky and found each other again. Others decided it was time to find a new match. The way you find your match is by hugging them. The indication is you swap eye color. 

  • Enter Andi and Amber. The skeptic and the believer. Andi who’ll read stories of people discovering their soulmate and grinning when she sees her parents eyes reflect each other.
  • Amber who wishes these stupid stories would stop because not all soulmate stories turn out like that, look at her parents unhappily sticking together because of a story. 
  •  Then Jonah happens and she thinks this is proof that even if you aren’t soulmates you can be happy with someone else! Hes sweet, funny and likes listening to her. She almost wishes after their first hug that her eyes would change to that deep green. 
  • But Andi Mack appears and Jonah is obviously liking the girl, the look back, how he taught her frisbee and the bracelet. She becomes resigned to the fact that no matter what her relationships won’t work.
  • Jonah and Andi break up and Libby comes along, she and Jonah click like puzzle pieces and give each other a hug. Its no surprise when their eyes switch colors almost immediately.  
  • Andi Mack reaches out though and becomes her friend. Who would have thought that both of Jonahs exes would become best friends! Andi is funny and way too invested in soulmates but she also laughs at Ambers jokes and gives her a second chance after the Ferris Wheel and visits her at the Spoon to ta- oh no.
  • She and Jonah are great exes so she calls him immediately 
  • Amber: JONAH TELL ME THE TRUTH IS ANDI CUTE?                    Jonah: Amber…are you okay?                                                            Amber: I am having a crush disaster please h e l p
  • Andi is cautious about her hugs if shes going to be honest. She doesn’t want to miss the one where her eyes begin to change. Amber isn’t comfortable with hugs but sometimes she’ll grab her hand and they’ll smile at each other. It makes her feel happy like when Walker made her the shoes. 
  • They go the Andi Shack one day and Amber is in awe. Theres so many things to create and a CD lamp??? She is totally on board and they spend the day creating bracelets and laughing at each others funky doodles or necklaces. 
  • Amber notices various paper cranes around and asks about them. Andi picks one up “Well Cece was going to sell the house so I tried to make a thousand of these to get a wish, I reached 998 before they decided they weren’t going to sell so it worked!” 
  • Amber is like !!! Can I make the last two and one of us can make a wish? 
  • Andi shows her how to make a crane and while the first one is lopsided it works. She helps her make one more and then Andi smiles “How about you get the wish?” she shrugs and writes her wish on the last crane, hoping it might come true. 
  • The crane goes home with Amber so she can check if the wish comes true sometime. It doesn’t that night. But even if she doesn’t know it the wish will come true very soon. 
  • Fast forward to summer, they are canoeing in the lake. Andi has gotten a little bit better at staying in the boat but still they’ve flipped a few times. They agree to try one more time to get across the lake 
  • Spoiler: They flip
  • But something happens when Andi’s life jacket slips off, Amber immediately swims over and loops her arm around her so they can grab the lifejacket.
  • After they reach shore they head into the bathroom to dry off and change. Amber is still breaks into giggles when thinking about Andis shocked face when they fell again. 
  • She walks into the bathroom to find Andi staring at the mirror. 
  • “Bambi? I know we got wet but its nothing we can’t fix”                           “No no its not that, come over here”
  • Amber comes over, worried that shes hurt and stops. Oh my god. Andis eyes are turning bluish-green. And hers are turning brown. 
  • Needless to say there is a lot of freaking out. Yeah we thought each other was very cute but this??? 
  • Its Andis dream and Ambers nightmare. 
  • Andi (internally): OH MY GOD YES ITS AMBER I AM SO HAPPY
  • Amber (internally): YAY ITS ANDI BUT HOLY HECK THIS IS BAD
  • Andi realizes she is freaking out a bit and gets her to sit down, remembering how Ambers parents have turned out as soulmates. 
  • After breathing for a few minutes Amber feels like she can talk without crying or screaming
  • They sit by the lake and braid flower crowns while talking. (Ambers is purple lilac and Andis is ambrosia)
  • After talking through it a bit Amber admits she already had a crush on Andi and was having fun hanging out, soulmates or not. Andi was hesitant to say anything because of the ferris wheel making her doubt it and she wasn’t sure if they were soulmates or not.
  • Nothing happens then but they both go home, oddly satisfied and very happy
  • The fair is coming back into town and Amber decides its a now or never shot “Hey Bambi? Would you want to go to the fair with me? As in a date?” 
  • She says yes immediately!!
  • In the end both of them have a great time and are really happy with each other. And if they kiss on top of the ferris wheel well then good for them <3 
  • Bonus: Amber starts to deconstruct what soulmates are and realizes while her parents didn’t work out, she and Andi will. 

This is dedicated to (sorry if this is weird): 

@bambikippen. Thank you for leaving comments and being so awesome! You are so supportive and just wiewphtioehtpote. You motivated me to write again <3 

@theobligatedklutz your ask made me feel like I should finish this and post it! Thank you for being super nice <3

@tyrusvibes Oh frick all my uwus are spilling everywhere! Thank you for leaving kind comments and being ammmaazing <3 

@heart-eyes-kippen because you made me feel confident enough to write! Thank you for being awesome and one of the nicest people in the friendom <3

  • After they reach shore they head into the bathroom to dry off and change. Amber is still breaks into giggles when thinking about Andis shocked face when they fell again. 
  • She walks into the bathroom to find Andi staring at the mirror. 
  • “Bambi? I know we got wet but its nothing we can’t fix”                           “No no its not that, come over here”
  • Amber comes over, worried that shes hurt and stops. Oh my god. Andis eyes are turning bluish-green. And hers are turning brown. 
  • Needless to say there is a lot of freaking out. Yeah we thought each other was very cute but this??? 
  • Its Andis dream and Ambers nightmare.

  • Amber (internally): YAY ITS ANDI BUT HOLY HECK THIS IS BAD
  • Andi realizes she is freaking out a bit and gets her to sit down, remembering how Ambers parents have turned out as soulmates.

  • After talking through it a bit Amber admits she already had a crush on Andi and was having fun hanging out, soulmates or not. Andi was hesitant to say anything because of the ferris wheel making her doubt it and she wasn’t sure if they were soulmates or not.
  • Nothing happens then but they both go home, oddly satisfied and very happy
  • The fair is coming back into town and Amber decides its a now or never shot “Hey Bambi? Would you want to go to the fair with me? As in a date?” 
  • She says yes immediately!!
  • In the end both of them have a great time and are really happy with each other. And if they kiss on top of the ferris wheel well then good for them <3 
  • Bonus: Amber starts to deconstruct what soulmates are and realizes while her parents didn’t work out, she and Andi will.

Theres a story of how humans were originally connected to the one who they would spend life with, platonic or romantic. But the gods decided the human connection like that was too powerful and separated each pair. Some were lucky and found each other again. Others decided it was time to find a new match. The way you find your match is by hugging them. The indication is you swap eye color. 

  • Enter Andi and Amber. The skeptic and the believer. Andi who’ll read stories of people discovering their soulmate and grinning when she sees her parents eyes reflect each other.
  • Amber who wishes these stupid stories would stop because not all soulmate stories turn out like that, look at her parents unhappily sticking together because of a story. 
  •  Then Jonah happens and she thinks this is proof that even if you aren’t soulmates you can be happy with someone else! Hes sweet, funny and likes listening to her. She almost wishes after their first hug that her eyes would change to that deep green. 
  • But Andi Mack appears and Jonah is obviously liking the girl, the look back, how he taught her frisbee and the bracelet. She becomes resigned to the fact that no matter what her relationships won’t work.
  • Jonah and Andi break up and Libby comes along, she and Jonah click like puzzle pieces and give each other a hug. Its no surprise when their eyes switch colors almost immediately.  
  • Andi Mack reaches out though and becomes her friend. Who would have thought that both of Jonahs exes would become best friends! Andi is funny and way too invested in soulmates but she also laughs at Ambers jokes and gives her a second chance after the Ferris Wheel and visits her at the Spoon to ta- oh no.
  • She and Jonah are great exes so she calls him immediately 
  • Amber: JONAH TELL ME THE TRUTH IS ANDI CUTE?                    Jonah: Amber…are you okay?                                                            Amber: I am having a crush disaster please h e l p
  • Andi is cautious about her hugs if shes going to be honest. She doesn’t want to miss the one where her eyes begin to change. Amber isn’t comfortable with hugs but sometimes she’ll grab her hand and they’ll smile at each other. It makes her feel happy like when Walker made her the shoes. 
  • They go the Andi Shack one day and Amber is in awe. Theres so many things to create and a CD lamp??? She is totally on board and they spend the day creating bracelets and laughing at each others funky doodles or necklaces. 
  • Amber notices various paper cranes around and asks about them. Andi picks one up “Well Cece was going to sell the house so I tried to make a thousand of these to get a wish, I reached 998 before they decided they weren’t going to sell so it worked!” 
  • Amber is like !!! Can I make the last two and one of us can make a wish? 
  • Andi shows her how to make a crane and while the first one is lopsided it works. She helps her make one more and then Andi smiles “How about you get the wish?” she shrugs and writes her wish on the last crane, hoping it might come true. 
  • The crane goes home with Amber so she can check if the wish comes true sometime. It doesn’t that night. But even if she doesn’t know it the wish will come true very soon. 
  • Fast forward to summer, they are canoeing in the lake. Andi has gotten a little bit better at staying in the boat but still they’ve flipped a few times. They agree to try one more time to get across the lake 
  • Spoiler: They flip
  • But something happens when Andi’s life jacket slips off, Amber immediately swims over and loops her arm around her so they can grab the lifejacket.
  • After they reach shore they head into the bathroom to dry off and change. Amber is still breaks into giggles when thinking about Andis shocked face when they fell again. 
  • She walks into the bathroom to find Andi staring at the mirror. 
  • “Bambi? I know we got wet but its nothing we can’t fix”                           “No no its not that, come over here”
  • Amber comes over, worried that shes hurt and stops. Oh my god. Andis eyes are turning bluish-green. And hers are turning brown. 
  • Needless to say there is a lot of freaking out. Yeah we thought each other was very cute but this??? 
  • Its Andis dream and Ambers nightmare. 
  • Andi (internally): OH MY GOD YES ITS AMBER I AM SO HAPPY
  • Amber (internally): YAY ITS ANDI BUT HOLY HECK THIS IS BAD
  • Andi realizes she is freaking out a bit and gets her to sit down, remembering how Ambers parents have turned out as soulmates. 
  • After breathing for a few minutes Amber feels like she can talk without crying or screaming
  • They sit by the lake and braid flower crowns while talking. (Ambers is purple lilac and Andis is ambrosia)
  • After talking through it a bit Amber admits she already had a crush on Andi and was having fun hanging out, soulmates or not. Andi was hesitant to say anything because of the ferris wheel making her doubt it and she wasn’t sure if they were soulmates or not.
  • Nothing happens then but they both go home, oddly satisfied and very happy
  • The fair is coming back into town and Amber decides its a now or never shot “Hey Bambi? Would you want to go to the fair with me? As in a date?” 
  • She says yes immediately!!
  • In the end both of them have a great time and are really happy with each other. And if they kiss on top of the ferris wheel well then good for them <3 
  • Bonus: Amber starts to deconstruct what soulmates are and realizes while her parents didn’t work out, she and Andi will.

Enjoy!

summary: there’s so much happiness that we are still yet to find: tiny epilogue summary: “TJ has been offered a basketball scholarship to...
body:
there’s so much happiness that we are still yet to find: tiny epilogue

summary:

“TJ has been offered a basketball scholarship to NYU, coincidentally the same university you’re trying to get into.”
“Congrats.” Cyrus said dryly, and TJ, polite despite Cyrus’ expectations, nodded back.
“To qualify for that scholarship TJ needs a C+ average in Calc 1, and he’s not getting there.” She looked at TJ who stared blankly ahead with a thin-lipped grimace, clearly uncomfortable, “and since you’re one of my best students, I think it would be good for you to maybe… tutor him?”

read it on ao3:

https://archiveofourown.org/works/17789465/chapters/42105527

this is still a part of the fic written for @tgaykippen, hope you still like this teeny tiny addition to it

tags: tj got jealous of the puppy
he wanted to be the recipient
and i wanna see cyrus hug a puppy
summary:
Cyrus: Aw TJ, look at that cute puppy! All alone in the cold! It must be freezing! 
TJ: Cyrus, its body is covered entirely in...
body:
Cyrus: Aw TJ, look at that cute puppy! All alone in the cold! It must be freezing!

TJ: Cyrus, its body is covered entirely in fur. I’m sure it’s fine.

Cyrus, crouching down, hugging the puppy to his chest and kissing its nose: No look at it, it’s shaking! Are you cold, cutie? Don’t worry, I’ll keep you warm. I’ll hold you tight and I won’t let go until you warm up, okay? Yes I will!

TJ:

TJ, pulling his hoodie tighter around himself and shivering theatrically: BRRRRRR! MAN, WHEN DID IT GET SO COLD OUT HERE??

summary: Give me 7 reasons to love Joshua Rush and 7 more for loving Luke Mullen
question: Give me 7 reasons to love Joshua Rush and 7 more for loving Luke Mullen
answer:
JRush:

1. He stands up for what he believes in.

2. The fact that he puts the best effort in everything he does.

3. His incredible acting and his want to do Cyrus’ role justice.

4. His humour and kindness.

5. He genuinely cares about his fans.

6. News In A Rush; his self-awareness and his world awareness.

7. His pink sweater hoodie and his sunglasses.

+1: he has Ice Ice Baby memorized.

LMullen:

1. He is a fantastic actor.

2. He genuinely cares about how he portrays TJ for the audience.

3. He genuinely loves his fans too.

4. He is such a dork.

5. His taste in music.

6. His fashion

7. His relationship with the rest of the cast and crew.

+1: he is so fkn funny.

summary: I just want to wish my dear friend and Tumblr sister/daughter @tjskipping a happy and glorious birthday!!! Ina, you were one of...
body:
I just want to wish my dear friend and Tumblr sister/daughter @tjskipping a happy and glorious birthday!!!

Ina, you were one of my first friends on Tumblr when I first started this blog. I’m very shy, even on the internet, and you reached out to me, first! Within a few months, I’ve considered you a wonderful friend who not only supports my content but also listens to my rants and fangirling! It’s been so much fun not only talking about Andi Mack and Tyrus with you, but also about K-pop, movies, and life, in general.

So, as a gift, I’ve combined your two favorite things: Tyrus and BTS! 

I hope your day will be as amazing as you are! Love ya!

summary: What do you think the wish says in the next episode of AM
question: What do you think the wish says in the next episode of AM
answer:
I wish I knew

I wish I had some sort of idea

All I can guess is that it’s Jonah’s wish maybe. Like since Andi seems to know something

Josh had an ask about it and posted a series of emojis that seemed like something about a family so maybe it’s about Jonah’s home life? And he is talking to amber bc her home life isn’t fantastic either?

summary: hi!!! im new and havent rlly been here when a new episode is released, i was wondering if u would know around what time theyre...
question: hi!!! im new and havent rlly been here when a new episode is released, i was wondering if u would know around what time theyre usually released at somewhere i can watch it online? im from the uk so the new ones on disney channel are a week late :( ty!
answer: hi and welcome to the wonderful dumpster fire of craziness that is the andi mack fandom!! on days that the episodes are released in the us (most fridays) i always have a link to the episode up either at 8 am mountain time or like 4 pm mountain time, depending if my body wants to let me wake up early or not. idk if it’s available in the uk, but disneynow.com always has the episodes up at midnight pst and 3 am est on the day that the episode is released in the us. there’s a few websites that post the episodes early, but they’re usually not great quality and the websites are a little sketchy, so i’d recommend finding someone on tumblr who posts the episodes (me!)
